description: A C++ solution about navigation, finding the best path from one location to another.
title: Navigation

content.content: This is a Navigation project implemented with C++. It can do path finding base on different elements like traffic, time cost…

content.title: innerContent
content: Utilized different algorithms for calculating, for example, used Dijkstra’s Algorithm
Constructed different data structures like Graphs, Maps for storing data including positions, traffic…
Implemented an console I/O system that gave users interface to interact with the program

content.title: innerConclusion
content.content: Successfully created algorithms to compute the paths and output system with perfect grammar and results. This program performs well and fast in loading data and path finding. The I/O interface in console is clear.
